com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.input.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
IController
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharacterController, SnowballController
public abstract class Controller
extends Object
implements IController

Controller implements IController to define the basic abstraction of an entity controller. It is responsible for monitoring and processing user inputs. It generates corresponding ITask in response to input events.

Controller is also responsible for monitoring the state of the IEntity it controls to generate corresponding ITask during the update cycle. This allows the Controller to modify the IEntity continuously through several update iterations.

Version:
Creation date: 07-11-2008 15:35 EST, Modified date: 07-25-2008 17:15 EST

Yi Wang (Neakor)
